Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is not always reliable and it does not read the paragraph or whole body of text in context and so edits can be faulty. where you teacher is trained in the subject and can read in context.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Some times in can be embarrassing when you are still getting the small things wrong with your writing, GenAI can sometimes help to point these out before you go to your teacher with it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from your teacher can feel a little harsh. Some teachers are a little full of themselves and it comes out in direct and indirect communication with you or through feedback.
